title: Math 2 Course
description: Programming of mathematical models. Linear Algebra: Systems of linear equations, vectors, matrices, transformations, determinant, eigenvalues, eigenvectors. Differential equations: Basic modeling. Solution by computer tools. Manual solution techniques for the simplest linear differential equations. The Laplace transformation. Geometry and calculus: Partial derivation. Discrete Mathematics: Mathematical logic. Set theory. Relations, graphs, trees. Mathematical induction and recurrence.
creator: Margrethe Wold
